numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The percent of people who contact each other in person is drastically smaller than the percent of people who text each other.
3. I wonder about a reason for this fact.
4. People have an opportunity to see other people on social media.
5. People can update themselves about the lives of other people by posts on social media.
6. This opportunity may reduce the need to talk to other people in person.
7. This fact relates to my community.
8. I think that my community is outgoing.
9. Even in my home, I see a distance between my friends and our parents.
10. This distance is due to phones and texting.
11. The title is: texting vs. humanity.
